summary: Demo/Production Condominium Endpoint Separation - FULLY VERIFIED. Backend: 12/12 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All UI elements working correctly - dialog opens, environment selector shows DEMO/PRODUCCIÓN options, info panels display correctly (green for production, yellow expected for demo), paid_seats field shows/hides based on selection.

ui_bugs.issue: Dialog overlay intercepts clicks on Select dropdown options - requires force=True or keyboard navigation
ui_bugs.note: Common radix-ui/shadcn issue with Select inside Dialog, functionality still works

Backend POST /api/superadmin/condominium.fixed_10_seats: VERIFIED - paid_seats always 10 regardless of payload
Backend POST /api/superadmin/condominium.billing_disabled: VERIFIED - no Stripe integration for demo

Frontend CreateCondoDialog.dialog_opens: VERIFIED - Opens on 'Demo Rápido' button click

Condominiums List.demo_badge_shown: VERIFIED - Yellow DEMO badge for demo condos
Condominiums List.prod_badge_shown: VERIFIED - Green PROD badge for production condos
Condominiums List.status_column_demo: VERIFIED - Shows 'Demo' status for demo condos

seed_data_creation: Test condominiums created and auto-cleaned during pytest
context_for_next_testing_agent: Demo/Production endpoint separation fully implemented and tested. POST /api/superadmin/condominiums/demo creates demo condos (is_demo=true, environment=demo, billing_status=demo, fixed 10 seats). POST /api/condominiums creates production condos (is_demo=false, environment=production, billing_status=active, configurable seats). Frontend CreateCondoDialog correctly shows/hides 'Asientos Iniciales' field based on environment selection. api.createDemoCondominium() calls demo endpoint, api.createCondominium() calls production endpoint.
